subject: Basketball
Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Bostonians were surprised when the Celtics earned an N.B.A. playoff series with Cleveland but the Bruins missed the N.H.L. playoffs for the first time in eight years.
snippet: Bostonians were surprised when the Celtics earned an N.B.A. playoff series with Cleveland but the Bruins missed the N.H.L. playoffs for the first time in eight years.
